svg.title: MR-03: Team Excellence Coordination and Synchronization Framework
svg.desc: Advanced team coordination system showing synchronized skill development across team members, role-based specialization paths, and collaborative mastery achievements with real-time team performance analytics
svg.text: Advanced team coordination with role specialization, synchronized skill development, and collective mastery analytics

g.text: Team Velocity: +340% • Synchronization: 94% • Collaboration ROI: 480% • Quality Excellence: 97.3%
Repository analysis specialist • Business domain expert
Velocity estimation expert • Adaptive roadmap design
Synchronized career development with team coordination and knowledge sharing
